name: UGX-Mods Minimal Design
description: Got bored and decided to do some CSS edits to UGX... Use if you like. :P
additional_info:
Changelog:

Version 1.3:
  • Fixed some padding issues.
Version 1.2:
  • Restyled quote boxes.
  • Restyled code boxes.
  • Restyled spoiler boxes.
  • Fixed titlebg.
  • Restyled dropdown menus.
  • Fixed attachments alignment.
Version 1.1:
  • Added border-radius to avatars.
  • Fixed positioning of social media links.
  • Fixed home page slider on resolutions lower than 1920x1080.
  • Made some changes to pagination and topic buttons.
Version 1.0:
  • General changes for a more modern look (removed some gradients, images etc and replaced with basic colours, got rid of borders on catbg, navbar, ...).
  • Top right box thingy set to hidden.
